question:
Question: You are navigating to the 13th-floor balcony. Thinking back on past action generations and objects seen, what is the surrounding environment like at your current location?  
Choice:  
A. Highways and parks are on my right. Several low-rise buildings are behind me. A large square is below me.  
B. A building is ahead. Behind it is a large industrial park. A wide river is directly below me.  
C. A high-rise building is directly in front of me. Behind me is a large expanse of open water. A parallel highway is below me.  
D. Roads and trees are next to me. Many high-rise buildings are around me.  
E. Many low-rise buildings are clustered around me, with no obvious pattern. A parking lot is behind me. A small roundabout is below me.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: D; Reason: The images show a high-rise building with roads and trees next to it, and many other high-rise buildings around, which matches the description in option D.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 17)]
Option: [D]
Reason: The video shows the agent is on the 13th-floor balcony of a high-rise building. Roads and trees are next to the building, and many other high-rise buildings are around. This matches the description in option D.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: D; Reason: The images show a high-rise building with roads and trees next to it, and many other high-rise buildings around, which matches the description in option D.
